about_the_game:
Mobile Police Officer Earth GUMBLE
■Side-scrolling belt-scrolling exhilarating action game

Seigi, the main character of the game, is an officer who can transform into a mobile robot,
Seigi, the main character of the game, is a police officer who can transform into a mobile robot and fight against an evil organization.
You can enjoy super exhilarating battles in which you can reap a large number of enemies at once!
There is no recovery of energy at all!
A super, super, super high difficulty game in which you challenge to defeat the last boss in such a situation!
Only drop items can be permanently reinforced.
*The game will be released at the same time as "Hanasaki Shoujo! Superier GUMBLE", which will be released at the same time, you can enjoy the story from a different point of view!

Features
1) Challenge the ultra-high difficulty level with no recovery of health at all!
2) Dusty world view of Showa-era special effects homage!
3) Super exhilarating feeling of cleaving off a large number of enemies at once!

name: Mobile Police Officer EARTH Gumble

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 又は AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti 又は Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: ■Side-scrolling belt-scrolling exhilarating action game A very, very, very difficult berserk game in which the player tries to defeat the last boss with no recovery of energy at all!
